languages.text: Данная регалия гарантирует владельцу помощь Инквизиции, выразимую как в ресурсах, так и в вооруженных и обученных адептах.

traits.locale_text: Данная регалия гарантирует владельцу помощь Инквизиции, выразимую как в ресурсах, так и в вооруженных и обученных адептах.

languages.text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.
languages.original_text: Данная регалия гарантирует владельцу помощь Инквизиции, выразимую как в ресурсах, так и в вооруженных и обученных адептах.

traits.locale_text: This regalia guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.
This regalia guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.
This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.
This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.
This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

languages.text: この指輪は持ち主に、豊富なリソースと高い訓練を受けた熟練兵の両方を異端審問庁からの援助として受けられることを保証する。
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: この指輪は持ち主に、豊富なリソースと高い訓練を受けた熟練兵の両方を異端審問庁からの援助として受けられることを保証する。

languages.text: 这枚戒指的持有者可以获得审判庭的协助，包括大量资源与全副武装的精锐战士。
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: 这枚戒指的持有者可以获得审判庭的协助，包括大量资源与全副武装的精锐战士。

languages.text: Este anillo otorga al portador la ayuda de la Inquisición en forma de recursos y de adeptos entrenados y armados.
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: Este anillo otorga al portador la ayuda de la Inquisición en forma de recursos y de adeptos entrenados y armados.

languages.text: Cet anneau garantit à son porteur que l'Inquisition lui fournira des ressources, ainsi que des adeptes armés et entraînés.
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: Cet anneau garantit à son porteur que l'Inquisition lui fournira des ressources, ainsi que des adeptes armés et entraînés.

languages.text: Dieser Ring garantiert seinem Besitzer die Unterstützung durch die Inquisition in Form von Ressourcen sowie bewaffneten und ausgebildeten Adepten.
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Ring garantiert seinem Besitzer die Unterstützung durch die Inquisition in Form von Ressourcen sowie bewaffneten und ausgebildeten Adepten.

languages.text: Bu yüzük, sahibine hem kaynak hem de silahlı ve eğitimli üstatlar sağlayabilecek Engizisyon'un yardımını garanti eder.
languages.original_text: This ring guarantees its owner the aid of the Inquisition in the form of both resources as well as armed and trained adepts.

traits.locale_text: Bu yüzük, sahibine hem kaynak hem de silahlı ve eğitimli ustalar sağlayabilecek Engizisyon'un yardımını garanti eder.
